actions.description: Euryale makes three attacks. If she is in serpent form, only one of these attacks can be Constrict.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns, and Euryale can't constrict another target.
actions.name: Constrict (Serpent Form Only)

actions.description: 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition until the start of Euryale's next turn.
actions.name: Snake Bite

actions.description: 11 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d8) acid damage.
actions.name: Verdant Bolt (Medusa Form Only)

actions.description:
Euryale casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 19):
At will: Druidcraft, Pass without Trace

2/day each: Goodberry, Lesser Restoration, Locate Creature, Move Earth, Transport via Plants
actions.name: Spellcasting (Medusa Form Only)

actions.description: Euryale moves up to her speed.
actions.name: Move

actions.description: Euryale makes one Snake Bite attack. If the target has the poisoned condition, the attack deals an extra 16 (3d10) poison damage.
actions.name: Venomous Strike (Costs 2 Actions)

name: Euryale [BMT]
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: If Euryale fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: Euryale carries one half of a pair of Sending Stones; the other half of the pair is held by Asteria.
specialTraits.name: Special Equipment
